pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, September 22, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will participate in the virtual Global COVID-19 Summit hosted by the President of the United States, Joe Biden, entitled Ending the Pandemic and Building Back Better Health Security to Prepare for the Next.

Closed to media.
